vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2965
vote.title: Schatz Amdt. No. 2965; To modify the funding provided for the Advanced Research Projects Agency-Energy.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2982
vote.title: Markey Amdt. No. 2982; To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a review and submit a report on energy production in the United States and the effects of crude oil exports.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 3021
vote.title: Crapo Amdt. No. 3021; To enable civilian research and development of advanced nuclear energy technologies by private and public institutions, to expand theoretical and practical knowledge of nuclear physics, chemistry, and materials science.

vote.question: On the Nomination
vote.title: Confirmation John Michael Vazquez, of New Jersey, to be U.S. District Judge for the District of New Jersey

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Veto Message to Accompany S.J. Res. 22; A joint resolution providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Corps of Engineers and the Environmental Protection Agency relating to the definition of "waters of the United States" under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to H.R. 4038 ; A bill to require that supplemental certifications and background investigations be completed prior to the admission of certain aliens as refugees, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Nomination
vote.title: Confirmation Wilhelmina Marie Wright, of Minnesota, to be U.S. District Judge

vote.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to S. 2232; A bill to require a full audit of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal reserve banks by the Comptroller General of the United States, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Nomination
vote.title: Nomination Luis Felipe Restrepo, of Pennsylvania, to be U.S. Circuit Judge for the Third Circuit
